title: How to get information about philosophy - Quora

response.answer_text: Walk through the bush or along a beach and become aware of your five sense’s. Let go of all your beliefs and enjoy the notes and melody of nature from an unconditional love perspective. Your own unique connection will give you a theme and an insight into the melody of nature. This can become a moment and a magnitude for the flow of information about philosophy. The best way into philosophy is from personal experience. If you learn philosophy from books and masters then their bias also effects yours. Humanity is shifting into a new density of consciousness and is beginning a new cycle of energy. The slate is clean and new ideas are beginning to manifest.

Search the internet or go to a library? Take care which philosophy you adopt though. 1 CORINTHIANS 3:19 For the wisdom of this world is foolishness with God. For it is written “HE TAKETH THE WISE IN THEIR OWN CRAFTINESS.
